name: Anton the ghostbuster
description:
A little game I made with my son. Don't let anton be catched by the ghosts. Eat mushrooms to get super power.

Please donate if you like it!

How to play the game:

Use Cursor to navigate: ⬅️ Move Anton left -- Move Anton right ➡️

  • Avoid the ghosts, if head of Anton is white.
  • Collect the mushrooms
  • Yellow mushroom: +1 live
  • Red mushroom: Turn on superpower (yellow head) for 5 seconds. Catch monsters and get 2 points each.
